briefTitle: Efficacy & Safety Study of Once-weekly Oral Aripiprazole in Children and Adolescents With Tourette's Disorder
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Study Evaluating the Safety and Efficacy of Flexible-Dose Once-weekly Oral Aripiprazole in Children and Adolescents With Tourette's Disorder
summary: The goal of the current study is to determine efficacy and safety of once-weekly aripiprazole in reducing Total Tic Severity (TTS) score in children and adolescents with Tourette's Disorder.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Yale Global Tic Severity Scale (YGTSS) - Total Tic Score (TTS)
